name: Dailycurlz oil mix
description:
It is  critical that you moisturize your scalp to maintain its health and vitality. You'll want to add moisturizing your scalp to your daily health and beauty regimen. It will only take a moment and you'll prevent many embarrassing situations.
Moisturize your scalp after your shower with a  9 100% natural oils mixl. DailyCurlz oils  makes an excellent moisturizer that is loaded with vitamin E.
It is ideal for use as a dandruff treatment because it makes a great conditioner for your hair.
As an added bonus, it will not only moisturize your scalp, but it will protect your hair from dryness and brittleness.
LINSEED OR FLAXSEED OIL
SHEA BUTTER
AVOCADO OIL
COCONUT OIL
ALMOND OIL
OLIVE OIL
JOJOBA OIL
GRAPESEED OIL
SAPUYULO (SAPOTE)
